posts.question: Anyone know why this is happening?
answers: The website only works if I run ./server , and then wait about a minute for it to get a connection.

posts.question: Hi, I could only obtain 404 error when tried to open like this: But I tried curl -D - http://localhost:8000/hello, it looks quite normal. Same results happen to all path. What could be the issue here, thanks in advance!!!
answers: is your code making every webpage return a send_404 message?
yes, dunno why the path will become user agent instead of the path given in the request when I use browser to open the website
well if you coded it so that every web page returns send_404, change it so based on the web page request it returns something else
yes, already dealt with that. thank u very much!
